summary: The “Strengthening Transparency and Obligations to Protect Children Suffering from Abuse and Mistreatment Act of 2025” (STOP CSAM Act) aims to combat child sexual exploitation. It amends existing federal law to enhance protections for child victims and witnesses in federal court, facilitate restitution payment, improve CyberTipline operations, increase accountability and transparency in the tech industry, and expand civil remedies for victims of online child sexual exploitation. The bill also includes provisions for fines and penalties for non-compliance and reporting.
